messages.subject: tsuba question
messages.msgSnippet: http://www.nihonto-club.net/upload/joyimages/2440.jpg Hello group, I have a small Ji Sukashi tsuba I think is Edo Owari school. It has long running tokettsu in
messages.messageBody:
http://www.nihonto-club.net/upload/joyimages/2440.jpg

Hello group, I have a small Ji Sukashi tsuba I think is Edo Owari
school. It has long running
tokettsu in the mimi and looks well forged.

My question is in regards to the theme. I see to geese at 12 and 6
oclock, what the the items at 2, 4, 8 and 1
0 oclock, are they plant fonds ?.

Do the two sections that come in from the mimi to the hitsu ana mean
anything ?.

Thank you for your time.

cheers

Rich Turner


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
